sentence.idiomatic: The company didn't reimburse me for my medical expenses.
This isn't an official receipt, you can't be reimbursed.
Of course you can be reimbursed for the costs of the office supplies you buy.

word.literal: to be unable to bear the burden

sentence.idiomatic: The expenses associated with putting on a wedding are getting higher and higher. Many young people are unable to carry the burden.
I spent, in all, 10,000 yuan on this trip.
Approximately how much do you spend on buying clothing every month?
The costs of this event are being covered by their company.
The information you provided last time wasn't very useful.
When applying for a passport what material does one have to provide?
You are 10 kilograms over the standard body weight. You should go on a diet.
This product wasn't up to standard; it got returned.
Although he can't say many words, his pronunciation is very standard.
Please fill in the amount here.
To apply for a bank account you need to fill in your personal information.
When you signed up did you fill out a form?
Pass this task to me to do.
I'm not comfortable about giving this matter to him to deal with.
Who did you give the document to?
The plan to develop the new product has already been approved by the boss.
He wants to construct a factory here, but the government hasn't approved it.
Who gave you their approval to sell this piece of land?
An afternoon nap shouldn't be longer than half an hour.
I have heard that his company's assets have already surpassed 50,000,000,000.
He is really incredible, you will have a hard time outdoing him.
Xiao Xu, let me tell you a bit about the company reimbursement policy.
OK, Mr. Wang.
Basically all work expenses can be reimbursed. For example, business trip expenses, client expenses, etc.
I see. So, what is the reimbursement process like?
Provide a receipt. You really have to be sure to get an official receipt. You can't get reimbursed for a regular receipt.
But some places only have regular receipts. What then?
For special circumstances you have to write out the reason. Before getting reimbursed you have to fill out a reimbursement form.
Are there different kinds of reimbursement forms?
Yes. This you really have to keep straight. You give the receipt and the reimbursement form to the department manager for approval.
OK. How long does it usually take to receive the money?
About a month. For special circumstances it can be sped up. Also, receipts that are over a month old can't be reimbursed. OK, that's it.
Got it. Thanks, Mr. Wang.

word.literal: to go on a business trip
